component.name: getDailyUsage
component.description: Returns total and user-level usage count for the day

component.name: getLast7DaysUsage
component.description: Returns total and user-level usage count for the last 7 days

component.name: getDailyErrors
component.description: Returns error codes and their count for the day

component.name: getLast7DaysErrors
component.description: Returns error codes and their count for the last 7 days
